title: ……situated at Road / Street ………… Society …………
clause_text: ……situated at Road / Street ………… Society …………. in accordance with Section 18 / 44 of the Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966. I forward herewith the following plans and statements, signed by me (Name in block letters) ………….. and the Architect / Licensed Engineer / Supervisor (License No ), who has prepared the Key Plan (Location Plan) and Site Plan (to be shown on the plan);
section: Application for permission for development under Section 18 / 44 of The Maharashtra Regional and Town Planning Act, 1966 read with any other Act governing the Planning Authority, if any.
